docs.snippet: As president of what is probably the largest single realty development in the world, Walter T. Shirley defies all of the rules of the accepted real estate man. He's a former song-and-dance man of the old vaudeville days turned business man.

docs.snippet: ATLANTA, Sept. 10--For the first time in its history, the famed East Lake course of the Atlanta Athletic Club will be the site of a United States Golf Association championship when the fiftieth women's title tournament gets under way tomorrow.
docs.lead_paragraph: ATLANTA, Sept. 10--For the first time in its history, the famed East Lake course of the Atlanta Athletic Club will be the site of a United States Golf Association championship when the fiftieth women's title tournament gets under way tomorrow.

headline.main: U.S. Women's Golf Championship Listed to Begin at Atlanta Today; Mrs. Porter to Open Defense of Laurels in One of 41 First-Round Matches--Miss Riley Looms as Favorite to Win

byline.original: By LINCOLN A. WERDEN Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES

docs.snippet: ATLANTA, Sept, 11--Although she had to rally to win, Mrs. Mark Porter, the Westmont, N.J., housewife and mother of two youngsters, successfully began the defense of the women's national title in the United States Golf Association tournament which...
docs.lead_paragraph: ATLANTA, Sept, 11--Although she had to rally to win, Mrs. Mark Porter, the Westmont, N.J., housewife and mother of two youngsters, successfully began the defense of the women's national title in the United States Golf Association tournament which started today over the East Lake course of the Atlanta Athletic Club.

headline.main: Mrs. Porter Launches Defense of Women's Golf Title by Beating Mrs. Breault; CHAMPION IS VICTOR AT ATLANTA,3 AND 2 Mrs. Porter, 1 Down at 7th, Starts Winning Rally by Taking 10th and 11th MRS. PAGE GAINS, 6 AND 4 Miss Riley Tops Miss Chatham in U.S. Golf, 8 and 7--Miss Hanson Triumphs, 9 and 8

byline.original: By LINCOLN A. WERDEN Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES
